This app allows you to search for information about your favourite TV series. To search for a specific series, just click on 'Search' in the menu, and start typing. 

To view a list of randomised series, click on the 'Random Series' item in the menu. 

If you see a series that you would like to add to your favourite series, simply click on the '+' button that appears next to the series' name. All of your favourite series are accessible via the 'My Series' item in the menu. To remove an item from your favourite series, click on the '-' button that appears next to the series' name. 

If you click on a series, more information is displayed about it. If you would like to search for a specific episode, click on the search button after clicking on the specific series. Here, you will be able to enter a season and episode number, and the app will display any information it has for that specific episode. 

If you choose to activate Data Saving Mode, images will not be downloaded.
This app gets all its information about series from TVmaze (available at www.tvmaze.com)
